fixes: Replace MacGPGME by Libmacgpg
Bugfix: Output doubling when encrypting/decrypting
Bugfix: GPGServices do timeout
Bugfix: Aliases are not handled correctly
Bugfix: Search is broken
Feature: Implement file verification
More: Many minor bug fixes and tweaks
Feature: Any file and folder can be en- and de-crypted
Feature: Signatures can be imported
Enhancement: Installer can update GPGServices in the HOME directory
Enhancement: New icons and GPGService is now associated with the according file extensions
Enhancement: Added Growl notifications
More: Have a look at the closed issues and last changes
Feature: Encryption support for text (thank you Moritz)
Feature: Started encryption support for files (thank you Moritz)
Feature: Insert key|fingerprint shows a selection window (thank you Moritz)
Feature: Started encryption support for files (thank you Moritz)
Feature: Signing does not require a default key anymore (thank you Moritz)
Enhancement: Installer checks for GnuPG now
Enhancement: Logout is not neccessary anymore
